query.name: Header
query.script: select 'за период с '|| case ${repmonth}::integer when 1 then '€нвар€' when 2 then 'феврал€' when 3 then 'марта' when 4 then 'апрел€' when 5 then 'ма€' when 6 then 'июн€' when 7 then 'июл€' when 8 then 'августа' when 9 then 'сент€бр€' when 10 then 'окт€бр€' when 11 then 'но€бр€' when 12 then 'декабр€' end ||' по '|| case ${repmonthby}::integer when 1 then '€нварь' when 2 then 'февраль' when 3 then 'март' when 4 then 'апрель' when 5 then 'май' when 6 then 'июнь' when 7 then 'июль' when 8 then 'август' when 9 then 'сент€брь' when 10 then 'окт€брь' when 11 then 'но€брь' when 12 then 'декабрь' end ||' '||${repyear}::text||' года' as DATEREPORT

query.name: spec
query.script: select 'ќбщий итог:' as FED,sum(fed) as CHISL,sum(rcof) as RASCHET,sum(pay) as POSOB from(select count(b.id) as FED, count(b.id)* max((select COALESCE(st.min,0) from benefitstypedir p, benefitsindexdir t, benefitsindexdirhistory ST where p.rosternumber = 4 and t.benefitstypenamedirid = p.id and st.benefitsindexdirid = t.id and st.paydatefrom = (select max(xx.paydatefrom) from benefitsindexdirhistory xx where xx.benefitsindexdirid = t.id)))* max((SELECT COALESCE(P.coefficient,0) FROM BENEFIT04PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit04id)) AS RCOF, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFIT04PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit04id)),0) AS PAY from BENEFIT04 B INNER JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON B.benefitspacketsid = Z.ID and (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER right JOIN subjectsdir R ON Z.subjectsdirID = R.ID --входной параметр -- GROUP BY R.fedreg; GROUP BY r.name) r;

query.name: spec2
query.script: select r.name as FED, count(b.id) AS CHISL, max((select COALESCE(st.min,0) as RASCHET from benefitstypedir p, benefitsindexdir t, benefitsindexdirhistory ST where p.rosternumber = 4 and t.benefitstypenamedirid = p.id and st.benefitsindexdirid = t.id and st.paydatefrom = (select max(xx.paydatefrom) from benefitsindexdirhistory xx where xx.benefitsindexdirid = t.id))) as NORMA, max((SELECT COALESCE(P.coefficient,0) FROM BENEFIT04PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit04id)) AS RCOF, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFIT04PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit04id)),0) AS POSOB from BENEFIT04 B INNER JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON B.benefitspacketsid = Z.ID and (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER --входной параметр right JOIN subjectsdir R ON Z.subjectsdirID = R.ID where r.fedreg = ${spec1.FED} group by r.name;

query.name: spec1
query.script: select fedregg as FED, sum(COALESCE(CHISL,0)) as CHISL,sum(COALESCE(RASCHET,0)) as RASCHET,sum(COALESCE(POSOB,0)) as POSOB from( select R.fedreg as fedregg, r.name as namess, count(b.id) as CHISL, count(b.id)* max((select COALESCE(st.min,0) from benefitstypedir p, benefitsindexdir t, benefitsindexdirhistory ST where p.rosternumber = 4 and t.benefitstypenamedirid = p.id and st.benefitsindexdirid = t.id and st.paydatefrom = (select max(xx.paydatefrom) from benefitsindexdirhistory xx where xx.benefitsindexdirid = t.id)))* max((SELECT COALESCE(P.coefficient,0) FROM BENEFIT04PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit04id)) AS RASCHET, coalesce(SUM((SELECT sum(COALESCE(P.PAYSUM,0)) FROM BENEFIT04PAYMENT p WHERE B.ID = P.benefit04id)),0) AS POSOB from BENEFIT04 B INNER JOIN BENEFITSPACKETS Z ON B.benefitspacketsid = Z.ID and (SELECT CASE lower(Z.repmonth) WHEN 'февраль' then 2 WHEN 'март' then 3 WHEN 'апрель' then 4 WHEN 'май' then 5 WHEN 'июнь' then 6 WHEN 'июль' then 7 WHEN 'август' then 8 WHEN 'сент€брь' then 9 WHEN 'окт€брь' then 10 WHEN 'но€брь' then 11 WHEN 'декабрь' then 12 end ) between ${repmonth}::integer and ${repmonthby}::integer and z.repyear = ${repyear}::INTEGER right JOIN subjectsdir R ON Z.subjectsdirID = R.ID --входной параметр -- GROUP BY R.fedreg; GROUP BY r.name,R.fedreg) r group by fedregg;
